feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud NAT
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud NAT

entry.content: Cloud NAT gateways for Public NAT support IPv6 to IPv4 network address translation in General Availability. For more information, see NAT64 in Public NAT.
entry.summary: Cloud NAT gateways for Public NAT now support IPv6 to IPv4 network address translation in General Availability.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud NAT now supports IPv6 to IPv4 translation
